# Directory

This page acts as a directory for the various studies that have been performed on the _births_ data set included in the `vitalstatistics` package maintained by this author. Every page included in this directory is generated using the data and tools included in thie _R_ package, and therefore is entirely open source and reproducible.

 - [Day of Week](ExploreDoW): what impact does the day of week on births?
